leadingImage.alt: A painting of the Atlanta Temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
leadingImage.caption: In "Atlanta Georgia LDS Temple Starscape", the Atlanta Temple shines under a starry night sky in this acrylic painting by Bekalyn Craig.

news.text: Assigned families are Day, Carson, and Suljic.
news.title: Building Cleaning – November 11, 2023

news.text: In 1968, graduate students at MIT found a strong correlation between singing in a choir and never getting cut off by someone in traffic. For males, there was an even stronger correlation of always having a green light at the intersection. See Susie Carson for more details.
news.title: Choir Practice – Today at 12:30PM

news.text: The single adults group meets for Sunday services in the Allatona Ward Building at 2205 Bascomb Carmel Road in Woodstock each Sunday from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM. During the month, they also hold social activities. All single adults are invited to particpate. Come and see and bring a friend!
news.title: For Single Adult Eyes Only

quote.author: Elder Ciro Schmeil
quote.text: To become a better follower of the Savior Jesus Christ is a lifelong journey, and we are all in different stages, moving at a different pace.
